observationTitle: Travel to areas at risk for Yellow Fever transmission
indicationText: Administer to persons who travel to areas at risk for Yellow Fever transmission.
clarifyingText: Given that changes in the designation of endemic regions can occur, travelers and health-care providers should obtain updated information from CDC, available at http://wwwnc.cdc.gov/travel/yellowbook/2010/chapter-2/yellow-fever.aspx.
